methods.name: GetStage
methods.comment:
/
 Get the stage of this preview scene

methods.name: UpdateRenderedComponents
methods.comment: Call this when you have attached/detached components from our stage, this will make sure only they get rendered

methods.name: SetPreviewDistance
methods.comment: Set the distance we want to preview the stage from

methods.name: SetView
methods.comment: Move the camera so it looks at the stage from this view

methods.name: GetRenderTarget
methods.comment: Get the render target that this stage renders to

properties.name: mDynamicRenderTargetSizeX
properties.comment: If we create a dynamic render target (that is, a new one every time), then this is it's x size

properties.name: mDynamicRenderTargetSizeY
properties.comment: If we create a dynamic render target (that is, a new one every time), then this is it's y size

properties.name: mDynamicPixelFormat
properties.comment: Set the pixel format of a dynamic rendertarget

properties.name: mSceneCaptureComponent
properties.comment: The scene captor component that will generate the result of our render target

properties.name: mDynamicRenderTarget
properties.comment:
/
 If true, then we create our own render target every time we want to play
